SQLite is in the public domain.

Source: https://www.sqlite.org/copyright.html
Retrieved: 2026-02-21

All of the deliverable code in SQLite has been dedicated to the public domain
by the authors. Anyone is free to copy, modify, publish, use, compile, sell,
or distribute the original SQLite code, either in source code form or as a
compiled binary, for any purpose, commercial or non-commercial, and by any
means.
